heading: HB02434
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE INCLUSION OF ALL PUNONG BARANGAYS WITHIN THE COVERAGE OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM (GSIS) AND PHILIPPINE HEAKTH INSURANCE CORPORATION (PHILHEALTH)
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02434
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE INCLUSION OF ALL PUNONG BARANGAYS WITHIN THE COVERAGE OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM (GSIS) AND PHILIPPINE HEAKTH INSURANCE CORPORATION (PHILHEALTH)
